title: Chocolatey fudge brownies
ingredients: ['For the brownies', '225g dark chocolate', '225g butter', '5 eggs', '600g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '200g plain flour', '235g walnuts, chopped', 'For the chocolate fudge frosting', '250g caster sugar', '250ml double cream', '150g dark chocolate', '110g butter, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
